trans-unit.source: Represents a method that will handle the routed events that enables a drag-and-drop operation to be canceled by the drag source, for example <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.QueryContinueDrag"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa um método que irá processar os eventos encaminhados que permite que uma operação de arrastar e largar ser cancelado pela origem de arrastar, por exemplo <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.QueryContinueDrag"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events: - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: Este delegado é utilizado com os seguintes eventos anexados:- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>Este delegado também é utilizado com os seguintes eventos encaminhados em elementos de base.</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Estes eventos encaminhados reencaminhar os eventos anexados listados anteriormente para os tornar mais acessível para o modelo de elemento geral [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>Os eventos anexados e os eventos de elemento base encaminhado partilham os seus dados de evento e o bubbling e túnel versões dos eventos encaminhados também partilham dados de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode afetar as características processadas do evento que circula-lo a rota de evento.
Para obter mais informações, consulte [descrição geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> attached event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>evento anexado ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar e largar e permite que a origem de arrastar determinar se a operação de arrastar e largar deverá ser cancelada.</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>
